text: Leroy Patrick Chollet (March 5, 1924 – June 10, 1998) was an American basketball player. He was a 6'2" (1.88 m), 190 lb (86 kg) forward. He played collegiately for Canisius College, and Loyola College in New Orleans. He is a member of both schools Athletics Hall of Fame. He played for the Syracuse Nationals in the NBA for 63 games from 1949 to 1951. ==External links== * Category:1924 births Category:1998 deaths Category:American men's basketball players Category:Basketball players from Louisiana Category:Canisius Golden Griffins men's basketball players Category:Loyola Wolf Pack men's basketball players Category:Small forwards Category:Sportspeople from New Orleans Category:Syracuse Nationals players Category:Utica Pros players
title: Leroy Chollet
